items.title: AstroX11/Xstro: A fast, lightweight WhatsApp bot powered Baileys Web API

items.content_html: HTML Includer is a lightweight and powerful JavaScript utility for dynamically loading reusable HTML components into your web pages. It is designed for frontend developers who prefer a component-based workflow in static projects, enabling them to include headers, footers, sidebars, and other shared components easily
items.title: Jerald-tonmoy-dias/html-includer: HTML Includer is a lightweight and powerful JavaScript utility for dynamically loading reusable HTML components into your web pages. It is designed for frontend developers who prefer a component-based workflow in static projects, enabling them to include headers, footers, sidebars, and other shared components easily

items.content_html: The TikTok Downloader API is a powerful and lightweight web service designed to retrieve and download TikTok videos without a watermark. It uses Puppeteer to interact with TikTok pages, extracting the direct video source URL for seamless downloading and integration into your applications. Features Watermark-Free Video Downloads
items.title: modollarpo/tiktok-downloader-api: The TikTok Downloader API is a powerful and lightweight web service designed to retrieve and download TikTok videos without a watermark. It uses Puppeteer to interact with TikTok pages, extracting the direct video source URL for seamless downloading and integration into your applications.  Features Watermark-Free Video Downloads

items.content_html: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/formique: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.

items.content_html: Giftly is a simple and easy-to-use giveaway bot for Discord servers. It helps you organize and manage giveaways with just a few commands. This bot is designed to be lightweight, efficient, and easy to set up, making it perfect for communities and servers that want to host fun and interactive giveaways.
items.title: athnf/Giftly: Giftly is a simple and easy-to-use giveaway bot for Discord servers. It helps you organize and manage giveaways with just a few commands. This bot is designed to be lightweight, efficient, and easy to set up, making it perfect for communities and servers that want to host fun and interactive giveaways.

items.content_html: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.
items.title: yangsnapify/minesweeper-js: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.
